name: Happy Birthday, Kid
description:
A short (1-3 minutes) experimental game, built over the last two weeks as a university project.

Happy Birthday, Kid aims to evoke emotion in the player, by recreating the sensation of fleeting childhood innocence in the setting of a 10 year old's Laser Tag birthday party.

Controls:

Left Click - Interact/Shoot laser

WASD - Move

Escape - Exit
